heading: Crumbling Hekma Dungeon Guide
content: The first zone of Crumbling Hekma contains the dreaded "Slay all enemies" objective. This zone is full shifty and has a layout with plenty of nooks and crannies. The second objective can theoretically be completed quickly, but the sheer size of the zone makes this part time consuming as well. Even though the mob types are favorable, this dungeon is worth avoiding after collecting its renown and the , a key aspect for Lightning Spear Sorcerers. While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! This dungeon is not accessible until you cleanse out the evil in . This unlocks the Dungeon along with potential vendors and a waypoint. This can be done solo, but goes by quicker with a group of friends. Reviewed by
